# `cape` Overview 

This R package provides an implementation of the ContionAl Prevalence Estimation (or `cape`) apporach proposed in *Accurate Prevalence Estimation for Emerging or Rare Infectious Diseases* by St√©phane Guerrier, Christoph Kuzmics and Maria-Pia Victoria-Feser (submitted manuscript available upon request).

# Package installation

The `cape` pacakge can be installed from GitHub as follows:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# Install devtools
install.packages("devtools")

# Install the package from GitHub
devtools::install_github("stephaneguerrier/CPreval")
```
